# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

Use this section to tell people about which versions of your project are continuously supported through security updates.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.0.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

We take the security of Anansi seriously. If you find a vulnerability, please do NOT trigger a public issue.

Instead, please report it privately by emailing hersoncruz@gmail.com.

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and provide a timeline for a fix.
